sentences.en: And that bottleneck will make type growth rates elusive.
sentences.cn: 而这种瓶颈将让中国式的增长速度显得不可思议.

sentences.en: China's strained railroads already become a bottleneck for the economy.
sentences.cn: 中国紧张的铁路运输已经成为经济增长的瓶颈.

sentences.en: Finally the example demonstrated the effectiveness of the bottleneck analysis method.
sentences.cn: 最后通过算例分析,证实了该瓶颈分析方法的有效性.

sentences.en: Fund is a bottleneck that limits the development of cooperative medical system.
sentences.cn: 资金是制约合作医疗发展的瓶颈.

sentences.en: Guarantee immediate response in case of bottleneck equipment down problems.
sentences.cn: 在设备出现紧急故障维修情况,保证及时反应.

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: Low - speed performance is a bottleneck of direct torque control ( DTC ) method.
sentences.cn: 低速性能是直接转矩控制 ( DTC ) 方法的瓶颈.

sentences.en: Ok, now I know what my application's bottleneck is.
sentences.cn: 那么现在你已经找到性能的瓶颈所在了.

sentences.en: Property: Who will break the development bottleneck property management industry?
sentences.cn: 物业: 谁来打破物业管理行业发展瓶颈?

sentences.en: So disk - based storage system is the main bottleneck of computer system.
sentences.cn: 基于磁盘的存储子系统是计算机主要瓶颈.

sentences.en: Technical terminology has always been the bottleneck for many science translators.
sentences.cn: 科技术语翻译历来是令许多科技译者“头痛”却不得不面对的问题.

sentences.en: The best known solution to the 4 KHz bottleneck is ISDN.
sentences.cn: 解决4KHz瓶颈最有名的方案是ISDN( 综合服务数据网).

sentences.en: The lack of personnel has caused a bottleneck in the shipping department.
sentences.cn: 人员缺乏已经给货运部带来了困难.

sentences.en: The transportation bottleneck has blocked the movement of the cargo.
sentences.cn: 运输的困难阻塞了货物的流通.

sentences.en: Third, strengthens the customer current capacity management, alleviates the bottleneck pressure.
sentences.cn: 三是加强客户流量管理, 缓解瓶颈压力.

sentences.en: Understaffing has caused a real bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 人手不足严重妨碍了整个进度。

trans.tran_cn: 瓶颈，瓶颈路段（常引起交通堵塞），（尤指工商业发展的）瓶颈，阻碍
trans.tran_en: a place in a road where the traffic cannot pass easily, so that there are a lot of delays
